text: The 1905–06 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Art, Science and Industry during the 1905–06 men's basketball season. The Blue and Gold, led by 1st year head coach Walter S. Brokaw, played their home games at Main Building. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Category:1905 in sports in Connecticut Category:1906 in sports in Connecticut
title: 1905–06 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team
